headline: Can the AI data center boom be stopped? Meet some opponents with battle plans.
summary: With the rapid advancement of AI, Big Tech has expanded data centers at a torrid pace with seemingly nothing to stop them. But, against the odds, local opponents are starting to make some headway — either by getting concessions from companies or slowing them down.
